ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated fruit punch
des: "These are so popular at fairs, but I never knew how to make one until now. So simple and great for a hot day! You could use whatever combination of wine and frozen concentrate juice you would like."
ins: Combine wine and fruit punch concentrate in a blender. Fill the rest of blender with ice; blend until mixture is the consistency of a slushie.
